project.name: |-- 009-evolving-apis
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + default methods
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to evolve an API declared in an interface.
GameRunner: In the example, it is demonstrated how you can evolve an API defined in a library (Resizable) without breaking the client code still based on the initial version of the API. This is achieved using default methods.
